ygData.subject: Path to arcs when using heritrix.war and Tomcat 6?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, everything works fine, I deployed the heritrix war in Tomcat 6 by importing the file, I can crawl and the crawl terminates successfully. But where can I

Hi,

everything works fine, I deployed the heritrix war in Tomcat 6 by impo=
rting the file, I can crawl and the crawl terminates successfully.

But whe=
re can I find the arc-files? I am not too familar with Tomcat, Java. Did I =
forgot something when deploying heritrix.war? I tried to give a new path fo=
r arc-writer (rights 0777 for user tomcat6), but heritrix gives me an error=
 IOException.

My Tomcat runs on Ubuntu 8.10 Server.

Thanks!
